content: @oli Do you have thoughts on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74554#pullrequestreview-462257044 ?
Is there a reason we can't get a str from SymbolStr that's 'static?
Well, I guess its possible that interner is not 'static :thinking:
Yeah, the interner exists only for a single compilation session. It is currently also limited to a single thread when parallel rustc isn't used.
I was just trying too hard to make iterator chains work, I guess. Converted all that into a plain loop and its a-ok now.
